LanguageData.Bullet_Ember_Celica.label: 灰烬天堂子弹
LanguageData.RWBY_Ember_Celica_Gun.label: 灰烬天堂(Ember Celica)
LanguageData.RWBY_Ember_Celica_Gun.description: Yang的专属武器灰烬天堂(Ember Celica)为一对金黄色的臂铠霰弹枪，默认双持，平时折叠成手镯形态，战斗时可迅速展开。
LanguageData.RWBY_Ember_Celica_Gun.tools.0.label: 枪管
LanguageData.RWBY_Ember_Celica_Melee.label: 灰烬天堂(Ember Celica)
LanguageData.RWBY_Ember_Celica_Melee.description: Yang的专属武器灰烬天堂(Ember Celica)为一对金黄色的臂铠霰弹枪，默认双持，平时折叠成手镯形态，战斗时可迅速展开。
LanguageData.RWBY_Ember_Celica_Melee.tools.0.label: 枪管
